overview:
Ms. Chen has more than 20 years of extensive IT development and implementation experiences in USA and China.

Global Product Development: IBM DB2 on Database Engine Design Technology IBM WebSphere on Application Integration & Provisioning Technology IBM OS2 on Operating System Software Development IBM Intelligent Miner on Data Mining and Analytics IBM CSDP on Service Hosting and Provisioning Technology

Taligent: IBM/Apple/HP Joint Venture on Object Oriented Technology

Start-up/Technology Innovation & Product Development: Applied Science: Dry Film Image Processing & Kiosk Development Biometrics: Finger-print Device Development. Greenplum China: Parallel Processing Database Technology

End-use Application Design & Implementation Consultant with Clients including

Bank of America, Allstate Insurance, Daimler Chrysler, Detroit Edision, Siebel, Epiphany, Lockheed Martin, Johnson Control, McKesson , Sprint, and T-mobile
